summary: The bill, titled "The Restrict Ugly Money Portraits of 2025" or the TRUMP Act of 2025, aims to amend Title 31 of the United States Code. It prohibits the inclusion of any portrait or bust of a living President on U.S. coins or currency. Furthermore, the bill expands this restriction to prohibit any living person's portrait or bust from appearing on U.S. currency. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on October 10, 2025.
